page.title: 12KEIGHLEY NEWS
page.content:
The "KEIGHLEY NEWS" is our local newspaper. It comes out every week. It first came out on 5th Ajpril 1862, priced 1 penny. The first "Keighley News" had just 4 pages, and the first Editor was Mr. William Byles from Bradford. For the first "Keighley News" there were adverts on the front page, the news was inside, with the sports news mixed in. There was a village news section, although a lot of the news was actually world news. Today the "Keighley Newa" is drawn up in the office in Keighley; the people who work on the news or editorial section are:-
Editor Sports Sub-editor Deputy Editor Reporter Sub-editor Photographers Sports Editor
